The purpose of the App is to assist you in accomplishing your goals. The Pomodoro Timer is based on the the Pomodoro Technique which was developing in the early 90s. Here is the technique in a nutshell. If you have a large task to complete, break the work into time interval segments ‘Pomodoros’ and then take a short break after each Pomodoro. Simple indeed but also effective in that you will be more productive and focused. 

Here are the steps to work the Pomodoro Timer App

 1) Create an account to keep your stuff to yourself

 2) Create a category - this will house all of your tasks. (ex. Category = Studying) 

3) Create a task - This will be nested under your predefined Category (ex. Category = Studying, Task = Math HW 

4) Set the Start and End time of the task, as well as how long you want each work session (Pomodoro) to be, the number of breaks you would like to take and duration of those breaks. 

5) Based on your start time, the timer will automatically begin, so get to work! 

6) After time is up, you will be awarded awesome points for your completed task to show off to your friends. 

7) After a long day of work, you can check the Progress page to see a break down of what you have accomplished for the day.
